name: Fullstack Developer
description: Experience with both frontend and backend development using technologies like Laravel, NodeJS and databases.

items.name: Laravel
items.description: Experienced in building robust web applications using Laravel framework.

items.name: VueJS
items.description: Proficient in creating dynamic user interfaces with VueJS framework.

items.name: NestJS
items.description: Skilled in building scalable server-side applications using NestJS framework.

items.name: ReactJS
items.description: Experienced in building interactive UIs with ReactJS library.

items.name: Database Management
items.description: Proficient in designing and managing databases using MySQL and PostgreSQL.

items.name: Version Control
items.description: Experienced in using Git for version control and collaboration.

name: Project Manager
description: Skilled in managing projects, coordinating teams, and ensuring timely delivery of high-quality software solutions.

items.name: Agile Methodologies
items.description: Proficient in Agile practices including Scrum and Kanban for efficient project management.

items.name: Team Leadership
items.description: Experienced in leading and motivating development teams to achieve project goals.

items.name: Management Tools
items.description: Using modern tools like Notion and GitHub to manage project workflows, track tasks, and facilitate team collaboration.
